thread.title: Report: Deron Williams, Wes Matthews to make their Mavericks debuts tonight
thread.title_full: Report: Deron Williams, Wes Matthews to make their Mavericks debuts tonight | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Report: Deron Williams, Wes Matthews to make their Mavericks debuts tonight
text:
Earl K. Sneed of DallasMavs.com is reporting that the Dallas Mavericks will have two key components to their starting lineup available for tonight's preseason finale with the Bulls in Lincoln, Neb.
Deron Williams (right calf) says he will play tonight in the @dallasmavs ' preseason finale vs. Chicago. #DALatCHI
— Earl K. Sneed (@EarlKSneed) October 23, 2015
Wesley Matthews (left Achilles) says he will play tonight vs. Chicago. #DALatCHI
— Earl K. Sneed (@EarlKSneed) October 23, 2015
With Deron Williams and Wesley Matthews both playing tonight, it's the 1st time the @dallasmavs will have their starting backcourt.
— Earl K. Sneed (@EarlKSneed) October 23, 2015 On Twitter:
 @SportsDayDFW
